query:
UPDATE campaign_request_topics SET (id, 
campaign_request_id, 
topic_id) = ((CASE $2::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $3 ELSE id END), (CASE $4::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $5 ELSE campaign_request_id END), (CASE $6::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $7 ELSE topic_id END)) WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id as "id!: i32", 
campaign_request_id as "campaign_request_id!: i32", 
topic_id as "topic_id!: i32"
